BR_text.BRsummary: Control edges are no longer rendered as dashed lines
BR_text.BRdescription:
Netron app and version: 4.5.5 Desktop app
 OS and browser version: Windows 10, version 10.0.18363.1082
 
 Steps to Reproduce:
 
 Change the attached TXT file's extension to PBTXT.
 Open it. It contains two nodes connected by a control edge (denoted by "^").
 Observe a solid line instead of the expected dashed one.
 
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/lutzroeder/netron/files/5379424/netron_error.txt>netron_error.txt</denchmark-link>
